entry.title: BitMail.sf.net - encrypted p2p email
entry.summary: Bitmail is a secure encrypted peer-to-peer email service that has been tested by users. The service can be accessed through http://bitmail.sf.net and the SVN link for Spot-On-Code can be found at svn checkout svn://svn.code.sf.net/p/spot-on/code/ spot-on-code. The commit browser for Spot-On-Code can be viewed at http://sourceforge.net/p/spot-on/code/commit_browser.
